attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament NOW and call a General Election to enable a mandate from the public to deal with the financial crisis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This financial crisis affects everyone across the political spectrum. The public have only one tool for their voices to be heard and that is to give their verdict at the ballot box.

Any Government must have the support of the people and every now and then an issue comes up that demands that politicians listen to the public. This petition is a tool to tell the Prime Minister that he must revert to the people to endorse or reject his dealings thus far and for the future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
